data.title: Added a complete log of incoming data from Session.Deserialize for debugging
data.body: as @pchote suggested to investigate #3343

data.title: Missiles move towards ground before moving towards target
data.body: Instead of flying straight towards the target from the offset they were fired from, they first fly towards the ground until they reach z height of 0 and only then fly straight towards the target. This looks a bit weird and unrealistic. Another negative side-effect, it also makes Shadow: yes almost useless as the shadow is hidden below the projectile image due to its zero altitude.

data.title: repair shortcut button in d2k
data.body:
The building repair has a shortcut to button "C".
Later in the game when I can build a Starport which shortcut is also button "C" I no longer able to to use it to repair buildings. I have to press its icon on the user interface.

I think the Starport shortcut should be changed to something else.

data.title: While paused clock still counts up
data.body: I am playing a single player campaign mission. I hit escape and the text "(paused)" appeared next to my clock. However, the clock is still incrementing.

data.title: Menu entries should support tool tips
data.body:
That way we could do away with this atrocity:
"Try to discover routers suitable for automatic port-forwarding on startup."
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/840623-menu-entries-should-support-tool-tips?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Lazy-load map preview should prioritize currently visible maps
data.body: When choosing a map to play the map preview images currently load on demand. If one scrolls to the bottom of the map list one must wait for all previously scrolled through maps to load their previews.

data.title: Noticed a missing colon in Mailaender's icon fix.
Added some more crap to the TS csproj file to hopefully make it work properly
data.body: Needs verification by someone who actually uses Visual Studio or msbuild.

data.title: TS mod improvements
data.body:
I thought I'd give the TS mod some attention.

Highlights are:
- no longer crashes when a building is blown up due to missing building explosion.
- added attack cursor.
- added rotor to Harpy.
- enabled barrels on mammoth tank.
- added sequences for nearly all explosions.
- major weapons overhaul regarding Burst, Explosions and ImpactSounds.

data.title: Possible R8 offset reading issue
data.body:
Some d2k muzzle animations, most notably the regular tank cannon muzzle and Trike muzzle, are cut off at the tip in some directions (mostly east and west), with the "missing" pixels showing up at the opposite border of the frame.

The trike muzzle also needs a negative LocalOffset forward value to show up at the correct position, so I suspect it's an offset issue.

data.title: Colorpicker crash fix

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: This replaces the front and back bitmaps with raw byte arrays. It doesn't address the underlying threading issue in #3696 (I don't see why that fails and can't reproduce it), but this changes the failure mode to be at worst a visual tear instead of crashing.

data.title: Cloak fixes

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
This simplifies the logic around cloak crates, introduces per-player cloak detection, and fixes units chasing cloaked units around the map.

The ITargetable and AI changes have been tested to work correctly wrt cloaked units in C&C, but wider testing is needed to ensure they haven't regressed behavior elsewhere.

data.title: Make buildings being captured flash the colour of the captor's owner
Game freezes when playing against AI
data.body:
While playing a game against an AI on Haos Ridges, the game locks up completely. I was running the game from the command line, so here is what the command line said [note that all of these messages appeared when I loaded the game, not when the game froze]:

vin:Resources nelson$ mono --debug OpenRA.Game.exe
Platform is OSX
Using Gl renderer
Desktop resolution: 1440x900
Using resolution: 1344x840
Available mods:
    cnc: C&C (playtest-20130818)
    d2k: Dune 2000 (playtest-20130818)
    ra: Red Alert (playtest-20130818)
Using OpenAL sound engine
Using default device
Loading mods: ra
Failed to load map: /Users/nelson/Library/Application Support/OpenRA/maps/ra/77ed872d24afce4c1c99e1c9a5d6c18bc4b94635.oramap
Details: System.ArgumentNullException: Argument cannot be null.
Parameter name: entry
  at ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipFile.GetInputStream (ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip.ZipEntry entry) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.FileFormats.ZipFile.GetContent (System.String filename) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Map.AssertExists (System.String filename) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Map..ctor (System.String path) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.ModData.FindMaps (System.String[] mods) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

data.title: Fix D2K build overlay offsets

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: This probably doesn't fix everything in #2293 (somebody will need to compare against the original game), but it does fix the worst issue which is enough to remove it as a blocker from the next release.

data.title: C&C mod DevCheats should be easier to access
data.body:
It would be great if the dev cheats were as easily accessible in-game via button/F2 as in the other mods.

<bountysource-plugin>

---

Want to back this issue? **[Place a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/826709-c-c-mod-devcheats-should-be-easier-to-access?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).

data.title: Parabombs/sonar pulse crash
data.body:
Introduced in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/commit/efb55d4cb9173107e3236522d03fa1f91830fbf1

These support powers were not updated in the above commit, and ra will now crash when you get either sonar pulse or parabombs.
https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/blob/bleed/mods/ra/rules/system.yaml#L828

data.title: D2k guntower muzzle and fixed LocalOffsets for both towers
data.body:
As title says. Thanks to @Mailaender for pointing out the solution in #3714.

This pull request sets QuantizedFacings to a better suited value of 32 though, so I recommend merging this one instead of #3714.

data.title: ObserverStats Production icons are bogus
data.body: They seem to default to wind traps in d2k and navy buildings for ra.

data.title: Fixed unbuildable units in the Dune 2000 tech tree
data.body: looks like we can't trust RALint here. Thanks to @Mozillion who notified me via IRC.

data.title: Don't display GPS dots for dead actors
data.body: fixes #3709

data.title: Fixed division through zero in moveFractionTotal
data.body: closes #3710

data.title: Fixed turret facings for Dune 2000 towers
data.body: closes #3713 inspired by #3625.

data.title: D2K defenses LocalOffset issue
data.body: Behaves the same as issue #3610.

data.title: D2k mod audio-visual improvements
data.body:
lots of offset fixes, added/fixed muzzles, changed explosions and sounds.

Note: couldn't fix gun and missile tower LocalOffsets yet, they seem to suffer from the same issue as C&C gun towers did a while ago. I'll make a separate PR for that once that issue is resolved.

data.title: Mine Layer gets stuck on obstacles when returning to Service Depot.
data.body:
If you have a obstacle near the service depot, such as an AA gun built right next to it or something. Ore miners will drive into it and just sit there forever instead of going around.

As in, the depot is a + shape, and you build something in one of the corners.
